title: ImpactFactor

flow.description: The [Flow] of the impact assessment factor.

location.description: In case of a regionalized impact category, this field can contain the location for which this factor is valid.

flowProperty.description: The quantity of the flow to which the LCIA factor is related (e.g. Mass).

unit.description: The flow unit to which the LCIA factor is related (e.g. kg).

value.description: The value of the impact assessment factor.

formula.description: A mathematical formula for calculating the value of the LCIA factor.

uncertainty.description: The uncertainty distribution of the factors' value.

description: A single characterisation factor of a LCIA category for a flow.
